sentences.english: You've had abad experience with Apple products.
sentences.chinese: 你曾有过使用苹果产品的惨痛经历。

sentences.english: No one must ever forget this bitter lesson.
sentences.chinese: 一定要永远记住这个惨痛的历史教训。

sentences.english: And the gut-wrenching crash in European equities has reversed itself a bit in recent days.
sentences.chinese: 而且欧洲股市惨痛暴跌的情况近来也渐渐好转。

sentences.english: I learned this the hard way through this experience.
sentences.chinese: 这是我从这次经历中学到的惨痛教训。

sentences.english: My old horse and I learned this the hard way.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的老马都付出了惨痛的代价才明白这一点。

sentences.english: I listened to my classmates tell painful stories of the first time they noticed men ogling their bodies.
sentences.chinese: 倾听同学讲述第一次发现自己被男的偷看的惨痛经历。

sentences.english: But now, they actually have encountered deeply grieved underselling.
sentences.chinese: 但现在，它们却遭遇了惨痛的抛售。

sentences.english: When the disastrous news reached her, she was grief-stricken.
sentences.chinese: 她听到这个惨痛的消息时，悲伤至极。

sentences.english: De Lesseps failed spectacularly. It was a complete disaster.
sentences.chinese: 他经历了惨痛的失败，这是一场灭顶之灾。

sentences.english: She learned a lot from bitter experience.
sentences.chinese: 她从惨痛的经验中学了许多。

sentences.english: The history between Turkey and Armenia is a series of awful events.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其和亚美尼亚在历史上经历了一连串惨痛事件。

sentences.english: The painful lesson of war should never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 战争的惨痛教训不容忘记。

sentences.english: Awareness about actors’ safety was greatly raised after this harsh lesson.
sentences.chinese: 这个惨痛的教训也大大提高了对演员安全的保护意识。

sentences.english: When Durron abandoned his restraint and gave into his emotions, the results were disastrous.
sentences.chinese: 当达伦抛弃约束，屈服于情感时，后果很惨痛。

definition: tears of blood (symbol of extreme suffering)/blood and tears
lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
shaking one to the core/extremely disturbing/hair-raising (idiom)
